      • generateSqlForNullValues

        protected static java.lang.String generateSqlForNullValues(java.lang.String sql,
                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> valuesNTypes,
                                                           boolean updateParameters)
        replace null value with "IS NULL" in SQL so prepared statement will work with null value in where clause. (not well supported) If values are removed see: http://forums.sun.com/thread.jspa?threadID=540698
        Parameters:
        sql - sql for prepared statement with '?' for parameters
        valuesNTypes - list if values for pst String[value,sqlType]
        updateParameters - remove null value replaced with "IS NULL " from valuesNTypes
        Returns:

      • supportsBatchUpdates

        public boolean supportsBatchUpdates()
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deterimines if DB supports batch updates. Based on DbBulkOperation.saveFirstChnunk(). Before calling this method, connect to DB using doConnect*() methods or exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        true if DB supports batch updates; false - otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
